description: Your spiritual guardians are unusually powerful.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Ability to cast spiritual weapon or spiritual ally, spirit magic class feature.

sections.text: Whenever you cast spiritual weapon, spiritual ally, or a similar spell that grants you a spiritual guardian, that guardian uses your shaman level instead of your base attack bonus to determine its base attack bonus, potentially granting it multiple attacks. Additionally, it gains a +2 bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance as well as on damage rolls.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Ability to cast spiritual weapon or spiritual ally
name: Spiritual Guardian
